classes.name: TheoreticalUnificationEngine
classes.docstring:
Integrates multiple advanced theoretical frameworks for negative space analysis.

This engine combines concepts from fractal geometry, holographic universe theory,
quantum entanglement, and information theory to provide unprecedented analysis
and security capabilities for negative space data.

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize the theoretical unification engine.

Args:
    fractal_analysis_level: Level of fractal analysis detail ("basic", "standard", "comprehensive")
    holographic_encoding: Whether to use holographic encoding
    quantum_correlations: Whether to use quantum-inspired correlations
    security_level: Security level ("standard", "high", "quantum-resistant")

methods.name: analyze_negative_space
methods.docstring:
Perform comprehensive analysis of negative space using all enabled theoretical frameworks.

Args:
    coordinates: Array of 3D coordinates representing negative space
    
Returns:
    Dictionary containing comprehensive analysis results

methods.name: compare_negative_spaces
methods.docstring:
Compare two negative spaces using all enabled theoretical frameworks.

Args:
    space_a: First negative space coordinates
    space_b: Second negative space coordinates
    
Returns:
    Dictionary containing comparison results

methods.name: create_secure_signature
methods.docstring:
Create a secure signature for negative space with optional metadata.

Args:
    coordinates: Negative space coordinates
    metadata: Optional metadata to include in the signature
    
Returns:
    Dictionary containing secure signature information

methods.name: verify_secure_signature
methods.docstring:
Verify a secure signature against provided negative space coordinates.

Args:
    coordinates: Negative space coordinates to verify
    signature: Previously created signature
    
Returns:
    True if signature is valid for the coordinates
